name: Patch Pots
description:
NOTE: There are some audio issues in this WebGL version, you can find a downloadble version for Windows below.

A Physics-Based Pottery Puzzle, made for Global Game Jam 2020, in Vaasa, Finland. Give it a play, and post your highscore in the comments section! :)

GGJ Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/patch-pots-9

Credits:

Lina Railio - Art

Henrik Hermans - Programming

Henri Tervapuro - Programming, Music, Effects
